Package.Name: Weather Forecast Launch Pad
Package.Description: A weather forecast launch pad that consists of a machine learning-derived forecast dashboard for a specified location and a route forecast application powered by Habistack and Geocodio APIs.

Basic.Name: Weather Forecast Launch Pad
Basic.Description: A weather forecast launch pad that consists of a machine learning-derived forecast dashboard for a specified location and a route forecast application powered by Habistack and Geocodio APIs.
